CmdLine: apt-get update &&	apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends bash wget ca-certificates make autoconf libcurl4-gnutls-dev gettext gcc zlib1g-dev &&	wget https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/git-${VERSION}.tar.gz &&	tar xf git-${VERSION}.tar.gz &&	cd git-${VERSION} &&	./configure --prefix=/usr/local --without-tcltk &&	make all &&	make install &&	rm -rf git-${VERSION} &&	apt-get remove -y wget ca-certificates make autoconf libcurl4-gnutls-dev gcc zlib1g-dev &&	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
